objective: Monitor security compliance status and generate compliance reports via Slack notifications
steps: - Review security configuration and compliance requirements
- Analyze security policies and their implementation status
- Identify compliance gaps and security vulnerabilities
- Generate security recommendations for compliance improvement
- Send compliance status updates via Slack notifications
- Alert on critical security issues requiring immediate attention
guardrails: - Define security compliance standards and thresholds
- Include specific details for each finding: Policy, Status, Risk Level, Recommendation
- Focus on high-risk security issues and compliance violations
